channel.title: Notes on Xu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Xu's Blog

item.description: Learning Reflection 0 Summary This week we learned about what is machine learning, and went through a case study on regression about house price. We also learned about the linear regression model, and how to evaluate the performance of the model by using the loss function, MSE, etc. Concepts Machine Learning Machine Learning (ML) is the study of algorithms that improve their performance at some task with experience. Tom Mitchell (1998): a computer program is said to learn from experience E with respect to some class of tasks T and performance measure P, if its performance at tasks in T, as measured by P, improves with experience E.
